notice.body:
Started managing this PR, using the Open-Source Management Protocol (Waimea), as Gov4Git proposal `4` with initial __approval score__ of `0.000000`.

This project is managed by [Gov4Git](https://gov4git.org), a decentralized governance system for collaborative git projects.
To participate in governance, __install the [Gov4Git desktop app](https://github.com/gov4git/desktop-application)__.
This PR referenced https://github.com/gov4git/sample-market/issues/2, managed as Gov4Git concern `2`.
